h1. Cloud Space Access Management



{{html:
	<tabset style="clear:both;">
		<tab id="details" heading="General">
			<div id="details" class="tab-pane active" ng-controller="CloudSpaceManagementController">
                <label class="left" style="margin-right: 10px; height: 30px; line-height: 30px;">Location:</label>
				<div ng-switch="clodSpaceLocation" style="margin-bottom: 10px;">
                  <img src="/$$space/.files/img/flags/canada.png" title="Canada" ng-switch-when="CA1">
                  <img src="/$$space/.files/img/flags/usa.png" title="United States" ng-switch-when="US1">
                </div>
                
				<br/>
				Delete here your Cloud Space. Note that deleting a Cloud Space is irreversible and all data and authorizations to it will be removed!
				<br>
				<button class="btn btn-danger" ng-click="deleteCloudspace()" style="margin-top: 5px;"><i class="fa fa-trash"></i> Delete</button>
				<script type="text/ng-template" id="deleteCloudSpaceDialog.html">
					<form name="destroyform" ng-submit="cancelDeletion()">
						<div class="modal-header">
								<h3>Delete Cloud Space?</h3>
						</div>
						<div class="modal-body">
								<input type="hidden" value="hiddenmarker" name="hiddencsmarker"/>
								Deleting a Cloud Space is irreversible and <br/>
								all data and authorizations to it will be removed.
						</div>
						<div class="modal-footer">
								<button type="button" class="btn ok" ng-click="ok()">Ok</button>
								<button type="submit" id="canceldelete" class="btn btn-primary" autofocus>Cancel</button>
						</div>
					</form>
				</script>
			</div>
		</tab>
		<tab id="access" heading="Access">
			<div id="access" class="tab-pane">
}}
			{{include:CloudSpaceAccessManagement}}
{{html:
			</div>
		</tab>
	</tabset>
}}




{{html:

<script src="/$$space/.files/js/controllers/CloudSpace/CloudSpaceManagementController.js" type="text/javascript"></script>


}}
